scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy-static-files && parcel ./src/index.html
scripts.copy-static-files: shx cp ./src/favicon.ico ./dist/favicon.ico && shx cp ./src/icon.png ./dist/icon.png && shx cp ./src/robots.txt ./dist/robots.txt && shx cp -r ./src/password ./dist/password && shx cp -r ./src/time ./dist/time && shx cp ./src/site.webmanifest ./dist/site.webmanifest
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static-files && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url ./ && npm run purifycss
